document_data.name: Palace of the Hulorn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Palace of the Hulorn''' was the ancestral home of the [[Hulorn]]â€“[[Selgaunt]]'s merchant-mayor ruler.
document_data.Location: The Palace was located in the northeast region of the city next to the [[Hunting Gardens of the Hulorn]].
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Andeth Ilchammar]] was the Hulorn of Selgaunt in [[1358 DR]].
